channel.title: Confused
channel.description: How to set the NPC spawn direction in autospawn.java? I forgot it seems and all my npcs are facing the same way ( to the right) Please helP!

item.title: Confused
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“bonzakid, post:1, topic:274890”]How to set the NPC spawn direction in autospawn.java?
I forgot it seems and all my npcs are facing the same way ( to the right)
Please helP![/quote]

You can’t fix the direction the NPC’s look (I think)
They all face South

[quote=“Gold Light, post:2, topic:274890”]Example the 1 at the end should be the direction if it isn’t then I’m not sure ><

spawn = 945 3094 3107 0 0 0 0 0 1[/quote]

That 1 is their Walktype LOL

Read full topic
